Job title: Sr. Software Developer –eHS
Posting date: 7/19/2018
Job Location: Toronto
Company: OCI Inc.
Entry point: https://www.engineerjobs.com/jobdetails.php?lnk=ta_nJZORLc98xYErIXVnF7O-hlar-92gThXoDM3-WLeeShfWQsf8jJ8QPp5L6FcGggruPif2GWPy4FmlDXULt405OZcBFZfzuK_21EgShIVLU3IaT2VmaP5VeI5KzLLdYULK6dSn1b1e-QOaLmhRiKYZj3XMJrDFecNchl8p7d0cDo_eCpCLIgt9FFp7eiryA4CLLkRNCUo2q7NvX1V9HesPRU3mDzmv06qeY5kvTJMoYQac4WvhWSVIOLs5pyDuAfz1Kys8xCgba8D2D4E0ktnDz5QzydHPt3VurBtVkP3t2T4hoX5SiDFS3eCpeGyZ3-kFneAY1iQ0tQZGLjsSuBFHNotV2_exvZ0bARzCkskRP3PtbCDISQZ8XlErPgkwbtMyi1tl0cX3lShbVgBENpY6YCliLj8uTYQE7HfukFGhnS0SR2-lL2cOb54aRowjC8Gi8LmIaK0m-N5tBbY2-99WffM5BqiToFFIGnOiuhF_cssQD9Jd-b1eG7vcEvaj9Ol4rIChcUXiLH9ILpPtRaWxFgll3aUtAtvmXC88PT5P8vOROaspG-wobLHbFW3FseBfnYlM_JcK6fJUallkh2Nxug&isp=0&el=%2Fjobs%2Fsoftware-engineering%2Fcanada%2Fontario%2F%3Ff%3D1%26page%3D5&jk=YQVVNSjcvqTjA6iH8ugyA2BTYPvw-IVyetAapUnujLIRVj_yBkPSxA
Job ID: 156
Raw description:  Setup the K2 Five Cloud Platform. Configure environments for development, testing, production and mobile solutions including but not limited to: High availability architectures and Security – Cloud/Mobile. Mentor the Sr. Business Analyst in the analysis of customer business processes and transform these requirements into Business Model Notation. Work with the Sr. Business Analyst to develop new custom application forms. Develop test plans and scripts and complete testing for system solution. Configure and customize system solutions to meet the business requirements. Work with API development resources to integrate K2 solutions with multiple clinical systems. Establish best practices of K2 Server architecture, development, connectors and testing. A level of education, training, and experience equivalent to a degree in related fields. Extensive experience with K2 Five Cloud Platform. Excellent knowledge of basic programming constructs. Experience with API service architecture. Preference for experience with the Microsoft Azure platform. Experience with Mobile application development and deployment. Experience with report and form design development. Experience/knowledge of data analytics, SharePoint, Business Analysis and/or eHealth. Self-Motivated, works well in a fast pace environment & project group. Able to work on multiple tasks with competing demands to meet deadlines. Strong with Planning, Multi-tasking, Creative Thinking, Problem Solving, and has significant Interpersonal and Communication skills. Supportive of the transition from project to sustainment. Health Care experience preferred. Availability: Work location desired: Rate expectation: Software Development: 7 years Bachelor's MUST be currently residing in Canada. Only professionals with IM, IT, IS, ICT, MC, CM or SCM experience/skills need apply. Location:  Vancouver, BC. Start Date:  ASAP Duration:  Five (5) months initial Contract, extendable for up to another 18 months. Project/Position Summary On behalf of our Client we are seeking a Senior Software Developer with K2 software experience to assist with the setup and configuration of Client’s K2 environments - Development, Testing, Production and Mobile; Advise and provide direction on K2 development best practices and recommended K2 testing best practices. Responsibilities/Deliverables:  The Senior Software Developer’s responsibilities/deliverables will include, but may not be limited to: Experience/Skills Requirements:  The Senior Software Developer should have the following qualifications, skills and experience: How to Apply:  We thank all applicants for their interest, however only those shortlisted will be contacted. We will retain your resume for other current or upcoming relevant roles. Please send your updated MS Word resume quoting full role title and this Job Id SSD-180723 through Indeed.ca easy apply or ocihr@myoci .ca and include: _________________________________________________________________ OCI Inc. is Canadian based Information Technology (IT) Service Company headquartered in Toronto, with offices in Ottawa, Edmonton, Calgary, Vancouver and Victoria. We have been successfully working with the private and public sector in Canada, USA and globally since 1998. www.myoci.ca Job Type: Contract Experience: Education: Apply Now 
            Please review all application instructions before applying to OCI Inc..
